autoClearSearchValue.description: Whether to clear the search box after selecting an item is only valid if 'mode' is 'multiple' or 'tags'
autoClearSearchValue.description_zh: 是否在选中项后清空搜索框，只在 `mode` 为 `multiple` 或 `tags` 时有效

bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

clearIcon.description_zh: 自定义的多选框清空图标

defaultActiveFirstOption.description: Whether to highlight the first option by default
defaultActiveFirstOption.description_zh: 是否默认高亮第一个选项

defaultOpen.description: Whether to expand the drop-down menu by default
defaultOpen.description_zh: 是否默认展开下拉菜单

defaultValue.description: Specifies the items that are selected by default
defaultValue.type: string | string[] | number | number[] | LabeledValue | LabeledValue[]

popupClassName.description_zh: 下拉菜单的 className 属性

popupMatchSelectWidth.description: The drop-down menu is the same width as the selector. 'min-width' is set by default and is ignored when the value is less than the width of the selection box. false, which turns off virtual scrolling
popupMatchSelectWidth.description_zh: 下拉菜单和选择器同宽。默认将设置 `min-width`，当值小于选择框宽度时会被忽略。false 时会关闭虚拟滚动

dropdownStyle.description: style attribute of the drop-down menu
dropdownStyle.description_zh: 下拉菜单的 style 属性

fieldNames.description: Customize the fields of node label, value, options, and groupLabel
fieldNames.default: { label: label, value: value, options: options, groupLabel: `label` }
fieldNames.description_zh: 自定义节点 label、value、options、groupLabel 的字段

filterOption.description: Whether to filter based on inputs. When it is a function, it will receive two parameters, 'inputValue' and 'option', and when 'option' meets the filter conditions, it should return true, otherwise it should return false
filterOption.description_zh: 是否根据输入项进行筛选。当其为一个函数时，会接收 `inputValue` `option` 两个参数，当 `option` 符合筛选条件时，应返回 true，反之则返回 false

filterSort.description: A sort function for filtering result items when searching
filterSort.description_zh: 搜索时对筛选结果项的排序函数

getPopupContainer.description: The menu renders the parent node. By default, it is rendered to the body, and if you're having trouble scrolling the menu, try modifying the scrolling area and positioning it relative to it
getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位

labelInValue.description: Whether or not to wrap the label of each option into a value will change the value type of Select from 'string' to the format { value: string, label: ReactNode }
labelInValue.description_zh: 是否把每个选项的 label 包装到 value 中，会把 Select 的 value 类型从 `string` 变为 { value: string, label: ReactNode } 的格式

listHeight.description: Set the scroll height of the pop-up window

maxTagCount.description: The maximum number of tags to display, responsive mode has a performance penalty
maxTagCount.description_zh: 最多显示多少个 tag，响应式模式会对性能产生损耗

maxTagPlaceholder.description: What is displayed when the tag is hidden
maxTagPlaceholder.description_zh: 隐藏 tag 时显示的内容

maxTagTextLength.description: The maximum length of the tag text to display
maxTagTextLength.description_zh: 最大显示的 tag 文本长度

menuItemSelectedIcon.description: Customize the icon of the currently selected entry when multi-selecting
menuItemSelectedIcon.description_zh: 自定义多选时当前选中的条目图标

mode.description: Set the mode of Select to Multi-Select or Label
mode.description_zh: 设置 Select 的模式为多选或标签

notFoundContent.description: What is displayed when the drop-down list is empty
notFoundContent.description_zh: 当下拉列表为空时显示的内容

open.description: Whether to expand the drop-down menu

optionFilterProp.description: When searching, filter the corresponding 'option' property, e.g. set to 'children' to search for embedded content. If you want to configure the content of an option via the 'options' property, it is recommended to set 'optionFilterProp="label"' to search for the content.
optionFilterProp.description_zh: 搜索时过滤对应的 `option` 属性，如设置为 `children` 表示对内嵌内容进行搜索。若通过 `options` 属性配置选项内容，建议设置 `optionFilterProp="label"` 来对内容进行搜索。

optionLabelProp.description: Backfill the property value of the Option to the selection box, which is a child element of the Option by default. For example, this value can be set to value when a child element needs to be highlighted
optionLabelProp.description_zh: 回填到选择框的 Option 的属性值，默认是 Option 的子元素。比如在子元素需要高亮效果时，此值可以设为 value

:options.description: Data-based configuration options will get better rendering performance than JSX definitions
:options.description_zh: 数据化配置选项内容，相比 jsx 定义会获得更好的渲染性能

placement.description: Select where the box pops up

removeIcon.description_zh: 自定义的多选框清除图标

showArrow.description: Whether to display a small drop-down arrow

showSearch.default: 单选为 false，多选为 true

suffixIcon.description: Custom selection box suffix icon. In order to prevent the icon from being used for other interactions, the replaced icon will not respond to expansion and shrink events by default, and can be transparently transmitted by adding the 'pointer-events: none' style.
suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框后缀图标。以防止图标被用于其他交互，替换的图标默认不会响应展开、收缩事件，可以通过添加 `pointer-events: none` 样式透传。

tagRender.description: Customize the tag content render, which only takes effect when 'mode' is 'multiple' or 'tags'
tagRender.description_zh: 自定义 tag 内容 render，仅在 `mode` 为 `multiple` 或 `tags` 时生效

tokenSeparators.description: The separator for automatic tokenization, which only takes effect when 'mode="tags"'
tokenSeparators.description_zh: 自动分词的分隔符，仅在 `mode="tags"` 时生效

value.description: Specifies the currently selected entries, and is an array in the case of multiple selections. (Select is not updated when the value array reference is unchanged)
value.type: string | string[] | number | number[] | LabeledValue | LabeledValue[]
value.description_zh: 指定当前选中的条目，多选时为一个数组。（value 数组引用未变化时，Select 不会更新）

virtual.description: Turn off virtual scrolling when set to false
virtual.description_zh: 设置 false 时关闭虚拟滚动

events.name: onChange
events.description: This function is called when option is selected, or when the value of input changes
events.description_zh: 选中 option，或 input 的 value 变化时，调用此函数

events.name: onDeselect
events.description: Called when unchecked, the parameter is the value (or key) value of the selected item, and only takes effect in 'multiple' or 'tags' mode
events.description_zh: 取消选中时调用，参数为选中项的 value (或 key) 值，仅在 `multiple` 或 `tags` 模式下生效

events.name: onDropdownVisibleChange
events.description: Expand the callback for the drop-down menu

events.name: onInputKeyDown
events.description: The button is called back when pressed

events.name: onMouseEnter
events.description: Callback when the mouse is moved in

events.name: onMouseLeave
events.description: Callback when the mouse is removed

events.name: onPopupScroll
events.description: Callback when the drop-down list scrolls
events.description_zh: 下拉列表滚动时的回调

events.name: onSearch
events.description: Callback when the value of the text box changes

events.name: onSelect
events.description: Called when selected, with the parameter being the value (or key) value of the selected item
events.params: function(value: string | number | LabeledValue, option: Option)
events.description_zh: 被选中时调用，参数为选中项的 value (或 key) 值
